A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many things annoyed me about this movie. It was too long. Milk scene was a wtf moment. Leia not actually dying. Luke not wanting to train Rey\, then suddenly being okay with training Rey. Snoke was useless. Rose's character was not good (poorly written). I felt like I really didn't get anything new about Rey's or Finn's characters. The Porgs were cute.
